definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. [[וַתִּגְעַשׁ]] Ps 18:8 a = 2Sa 22:8 a Kt (Qr Hithp.);—quake of earth at theoph., Ps 18:8 = 2Sa 22:8 (rd. Kt; ‖[[רעשׁ]]).

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Impf. be shaken up, convulsed [[יְגׁעֲשׁוּ־עַם]] Job 34:20 a people are convulsed.

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: shake back and forth, toss or reel to and fro [[וַיִּתְגׇּעַשׁ]] Qr 2Sa 22:8 a (< Kt

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: ); [[יִתְגׇּֽעֲשׁוּ]] Je 46:7, [[וַיִּתְגׇּֽעֲשׁוּ]] Ps 18:8 b + 2 t.;—of mountains Ps 18:8 b = 2Sa 22:8 b; of waves of sea, Je 5:22; of waters of Nile Je 46:7 (cf. v:Je 46:8).

definitions.title: Hithpo.
definitions.body: Pf. [[וְהִתְגּׁעֲשׁוּ]] consec. Je 25:16; Impf. [[יִתְגּׁעֲשׁוּ]] Je 46:8; id. of waters of Nile Je 46:8; of drunken men, reel to and fro, Je 25:16 (fig. of nations confounded by ´[[י]]).
